description:
*This product is in the Season Pass. Please be careful not to buy duplicates.

This costume pack features the 12 children in steampunk attire.
You can modify what the children are wearing under "Costumes" in the Options menu.

Contents:
Steampunk costumes for Malt, Mei, Kyle, Boron, Socks, Chick, Hack, Sheena, Jin, Wappa, Britz, and Vanilla (can be used during intermission and expedition)
name: Fuga: Melodies of Steel 2 - Steampunk Costume Pack
